name: GiantKelp.
summary: We make AI real. We solve problems. We automate work. We improve processes.
about_us:
GiantKelp transforms businesses with AI. We're in London. We build AI tools that work.

Business owners see AI's power. They don't know how to use it. We help.

We make AI real. We solve problems. We automate work. We improve processes.

Our clients are big and small. We learn their business. We create solutions that fit.

We're partners, not just providers. We know tech and business. Our AI grows with you.

We're local. We're global. We keep you ahead in the AI game.
specialties: Product Development, Large Language Models, Artificial Intelligence, Business Strategy, Process Development, AI, Prototyping, and Automation

name: Candyspace
summary: Delight your customers. Grow your business.
about_us:
Candyspace are experts in designing, building and optimising digital products. We create websites, mobile apps and commerce solutions for ambitious organisations investing in growth and digital transformation. 

We are trusted to deliver by some of the world’s best-known brands, including ITV, Rolls-Royce, Mazda, Mars and Colgate. 

Our vision is to create digital products loved by everyone: the businesses we work with, their customers and our own team of passionate experts. We do that by finding the sweetspot between business need and customer demand, fusing insight, creativity and technology to build products that create value. 

Candyspace has a proven process to bring quality digital products to market at speed, combining our industry-leading design and UX capabilities with a deep expertise in technology. Through this, we’re able to increase adoption, conversion and retention on those products; generate repeatable revenues streams; and improve customer engagement and advocacy. We reduce risk, cost and complexity, while helping our clients embrace a test-and-learn culture. 

Once launched, we test, learn and optimise our digital products through data insights, with a continued relentless focus on delivering value to the business and relevance to its customers.
specialties: User Experience Design, Front End Web Development, iOS, TV OS, Android & Roku Development, Quality Assurance, Graphic Design, Display & Social Campaigns, Analytics & Data Insights, and Campaign Optimisation

posts.content:
How can Optimizely SaaS Core improve customer experience by making processes more efficient for marketers?

In the latest episode of CX Conversations, Senior Product Consultant, speaks with ’s Senior Director of Product Management, to discuss how Optimizely's SaaS CMS is transforming the headless landscape.

Watch the full video on YouTube:

Last month, our team attended ’s Summer Marketing Summit, where Experience Director, presented our CRO masterclass “Who Dares Wins”.

Catch up on the talk to discover insights on how marketers can leverage CRO to drive growth:

According to Invoca, 95% of car buyers conduct online research before ever stepping foot in a dealership, expecting to be able to compare models, read reviews and arrange financing online. 

Creative Partner, , shares how digital technology is transforming the automotive industry and how businesses can adapt to keep up with customer expectations.

Read the full article:

As digital landscapes evolve and the pace of innovation accelerates, many Sitecore users are facing challenges that are prompting them to consider alternative CMS platforms.

Director of Technology, breaks down the seven signs that your business is ready to migrate from Sitecore to a more modern, flexible CMS.

How can SaaS Core improve marketers’ ability to work more efficiently?

In the latest episode of CX Conversations, Senior Product Consultant, speaks to Optimizely’s Senior Director of Product Management, to discuss how Optimizely is transforming the CMS landscape.

Watch the full interview on YouTube or listen on Spotify.

We’re delighted to announce that our Experience Director, has been selected as a judge at the 2024 BIMA Awards.

The are the UK’s longest standing and most prestigious digital and tech awards. We’re proud to be involved in a fantastic initiative to celebrate the best talent in the digital industry.

We are thrilled to announce that today Candyspace have acquired , specialists in the design and build of ecommerce websites and apps. 

Profound – who have built award-winning ecommerce solutions for the likes of Interflora, Planet Organic, Majestic Wine and Protyre – bring deep expertise in implementing API-first, cloud-native SaaS solutions for their clients, with a relentless focus on building better customer experiences and implementing smarter technology choices. 

The acquisition allows Candyspace to deliver complex, best-in-class ecommerce platforms, driving greater ROI for clients and optimised user experiences for their customers. 

Read the full story here:

We’re thrilled to announce that we’ve been shortlisted in three categories at this year’s UK Agency Awards:

🏆 Large Agency of the Year
🏆 Independent Agency of the Year
🏆 Best Inclusion and Diversity Initiative

The celebrate that the impact that agencies are making across the UK and we’re proud that our work has been recognised.

Read more about the nominations:

Following this week's news that have launched a new headless CMS, we ask the question - can headless be a good fit for marketers?

In the latest episode of CX Conversations, Senior Product Consultant, talks to Optimizely’s Senior Director of Product Management, about the common challenges for marketers and how Optimizely SaaS Core is changing the headless landscape.

We’re delighted to announce that Lead Delivery Manager, has been selected as a judge at the 2024 BIMA Awards.

The are the UK’s longest standing and most prestigious digital and tech awards. We’re proud to be involved in a fantastic initiative to celebrate the best talent in the digital industry.

posts.content:
We are thrilled to announce that today Profound have become part of , digital product experts with clients including ITV, Mazda, Samsung, Global Media and Rolls-Royce.
 
This marks an exciting new chapter in our history: the Profound team will be integrated into Candyspace and we’ll now operate under the Candyspace name.

Together, we have an enhanced ability to design, build and optimise high-profile, consumer-facing websites and mobile apps, with a measurable impact for our clients’ businesses and customers.

Profound’s founder Tim McMillen said: “We are thrilled to be joining the Candyspace family. Combining our obsession for great ecommerce customer experiences with Candyspace's passion for building digital products that drive value for businesses and users creates an industry-leading proposition in our space. This strategic partnership will provide our teams with many exciting opportunities to create meaningful online experiences for retail brands that prioritise growth through insight-led digital innovation.”

🏆 Profound has done it again! 🏆

We’re super excited to share that our work on the Micheldever Group's Protyre website just won the “Best Breaking New Ground Project” award at the MACH Impact Awards in New York! This is the second award we've won for this project and it's always great to see our team’s hard work and creativity in pushing digital boundaries recognised.

If you want to read more about the actual project you can check it out here:

Kicking off a great event down at Caravan Fitzrovia this morning with some wisdom from our own on the digital maturity journey for B2B businesses. 💡   looking forward to other talks from our friends at and

Calling all B2B marketing and digital professionals, Join Us at “The Future of Digital Ecosystems” Event!

📅 Date: Thursday, June 13, 2024 
⏰ Time: 8:30 - 11:30 am BST 
📍 Venue: Caravan Fitzrovia, 152 Great Portland Street, London W1W 6AJ

🔥 What to Expect:

Engaging talks by industry experts on marketing blockers, tech essentials, and digital maturity.
Networking opportunities with like-minded peers.
A scrumptious breakfast spread! 🍳

🎟️ Limited Spaces Available! Reserve your seat now: Don’t miss out on this chance to gain insights, connect, and fuel up for success! 🙌

As we gear up towards our study on the role of Digital in the Future of B2B we are starting to pick at the big questions around Customer Relationships, Logistics, Data, Payment, Organisational Change and more.  

In the first of our series of short pieces, paving the way for our report, we ask - Is it the end of the Bacon Roll for B2B Trade businesses? And what does building B2B Trade customer relationship management look like in a digital world? 

Comment below if you’d like to sign up for the study and let us know what burning B2B questions you want answered!
💡Great to be featured again on . This time it's for our Protyre website project which saw some impressive results.
💡Great to be featured again on . This time it's for our Protyre website project which saw some impressive results.

📈 The MACH movement, born out of the limitations of traditional monolithic architectures, is gaining momentum.

In this insightful blog post, James Crook, our Senior Enterprise Architect, dives into the role of microservices within the MACH approach.

🔹 Discover how bite-sized services empower businesses to articulate and manage discrete functions independently.
🔹 MACH architecture combines microservices with API-led, cloud-first, and headless principles. It’s the secret sauce for agility, scalability, and future-proofing.
🔹 Not sure where to start? Rather take an evolutionary, hybrid approach. Prioritize low-hanging fruit, buy-in composable solutions, and find the right partner.
🔹 Whether you’re a purist or prefer a pragmatic blend, moving away from monolithic platforms is possible in many scenarios.

🚀 Embrace the digital evolution! 💡

Read the full article here:

The only way for eCommerce businesses to build a great Customer Experience is by drawing insight from meaningful data. But which information is valuable and how much of it is just noise? In our latest article, discover this must-have guide to cutting through and achieving data-driven, successful eCommerce CX, every time.

This project introduced the UK's first headless architecture with , , , , and . 

→ By using Storyblok, they achieved a 98% increase in conversion rates and improved user experiences. Congratulations, Profound! 

We look forward to continuing to shape the digital landscape together. 🚀
